products.page_subtitle: Discover our complete range of products and solutions
products.korean_desc: Professional tray sealers and MAP packaging machines for all businesses
products.inkjet_desc: Professional inkjet inks for industrial use
products.dtf_desc: DTF (Direct to Film) inks for high-quality printing
products.media_desc: Specialized printing papers for professional use
products.fujifilm_desc: Advanced Selfie Kiosk systems from Fujifilm Korea. High-quality dye-sublimation printing, integration with mirrorless cameras, and modular design for any space.

services_page.page_subtitle: Comprehensive solutions from production to distribution
services_page.manufacturing_desc: We produce high-quality products with modern equipment and certifications. Our team ensures compliance with international standards at every stage of production.
services_page.distribution_desc: We have an extensive distribution network throughout the European Union. We ensure fast and safe delivery of your products.
services_page.representation_desc: We represent leading manufacturers from Korea, Italy, China and other countries. We provide full support for entry into the European market.

about.page_subtitle: Our story, our values, our vision
about.profile_desc: ICIDA Technologies is a dynamic company operating in the production, distribution and representation of products in the European market. Based in Cyprus, we provide comprehensive solutions to businesses throughout the EU.
about.mission_desc: To provide innovative high-quality solutions that exceed our customers' expectations.
about.vision_desc: To become the leading business partner in Europe for industrial products and solutions.

resellers.page_subtitle: Partner with us and grow your business
resellers.benefit_1_desc: Special prices for resellers with volume discounts
resellers.benefit_2_desc: Full technical support and training for all products
resellers.benefit_4_desc: Priority in deliveries and flexible payment terms

fujifilm_page.hero_subtitle: Comprehensive photo kiosk solutions from Fujifilm Korea
fujifilm_page.booth_desc: The ultimate photo studio in kiosk form. Combines Fujifilm print quality with mirrorless cameras for professional results.
fujifilm_page.stand_desc: Flexible and elegant, ideal for events and spaces with limited room. High portability without compromising on quality.
fujifilm_page.cube_desc: The most compact solution for instant printing from smartphones via QR code. Perfect for cafes and retail stores.
fujifilm_page.dye_sub_desc: Vibrant colors and long-lasting durability with Fujifilm's guarantee.
fujifilm_page.mirrorless_desc: Integrated professional cameras for ultimate clarity.
fujifilm_page.qr_desc: Smartphone connection without apps or cables for instant photo transfer.
